title: 552.02 PUBLIC AUTHORITY'S SUMMARY EXECUTION OF SUPPORT JUDGMENT DEBTS; WHEN AUTHORIZED.
text: The public authority may execute on a money judgment resulting from money owed pursuant to a support order by levying under this chapter on indebtedness owed to the judgment debtor by a third party. The public authority may execute under this chapter upon service of a notice of support judgment levy for which the seal of the court is not required.
